meanings.definition: The sound made by a cat.
meanings.sent1: The miaous of the kitten was so cute.
meanings.sent2: I woke up to the miaous of my neighbor's cat.
meanings.sent3: The miaous of the cat interrupted the quiet night.
meanings.sent4: The miaous echoed through the empty alley.
meanings.sent5: The loud miaous could be heard from far away.

meanings.definition: To make the sound of a cat.
meanings.sent1: She miaous whenever she sees a cat.
meanings.sent2: The stray cat miaous loudly for food.
meanings.sent3: I tried to miaous like a cat, but it sounded funny.
meanings.sent4: The wind made the trees miaous softly.
meanings.sent5: The actor had to miaous convincingly in the play.

meanings.sent1: I heard multiple miaous coming from the shelter.
meanings.sent2: The room was filled with the miaous of many cats.
meanings.sent3: The choir of miaous was quite a symphony.
meanings.sent4: The miaous of the cats blended into a harmonious melody.
meanings.sent5: The miaous of the kittens were like music to my ears.
